body_html: @princebhatia09 I did a clean install of anaconda and then downloaded and did an offline install of the CPU version (see above) to get it working on my work laptop (which doesn't have a supported card). The cuda90 version worked fine on my desktop (after a clean install).

body: @princebhatia09 I did a clean install of anaconda and then downloaded and did an offline install of the CPU version (see above) to get it working on my work laptop (which doesn't have a supported card). The cuda90 version worked fine on my desktop (after a clean install).
